issues.title: Discovery: Confirm legacy Microsoft Access setup (local tables vs linked SQL)
issues.body:
Goal: remove ambiguity about what Access is storing and how.

Acceptance criteria:
- Identify whether Access contains tables locally (.accdb/.mdb) or is a front-end to an existing SQL database (linked tables/ODBC).
- Inventory existing entities and fields (customers/products/sales if present).
- Capture file locations, passwords, and any existing reports/forms that matter.

issues.title: Discovery: Define MVP workflow + screens (simple Python desktop app)
issues.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- Document the minimum screens: Settings, Products, Customers, Ring-Up, Tender/Finalize, Sales History.
- Document end-to-end flow: customer optional → ring items → payment method → PDF receipt → save sale.
- Confirm non-goals for MVP (no payment processing integration; just record method).

issues.title: Azure: Provision Azure SQL Server + Database (production)
issues.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- Azure SQL Server + single database created in chosen region.
- Connection endpoint confirmed (server.database.windows.net).
- Basic connectivity tested from a Windows client machine.

issues.title: DB: Design canonical schema (customers/products/sales/sale_items/settings)
issues.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- Tables and columns defined with primary keys + foreign keys.
- Includes receipt number field and audit timestamps.
- Supports both unit and weight-based sales.

issues.title: Migration: Build repeatable migration script (Access/export → Azure SQL)
issues.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- Script can be run multiple times in staging.
- Produces a migration report (rows inserted/skipped/errors).
- Does not create duplicates when re-run (idempotent strategy documented).

issues.title: POS: Ring-up cart (add items, qty/weight, remove, totals)
issues.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- Add product to cart.
- Enter quantity for unit items; enter weight for weight items.
- Live subtotal/tax/total.
- Remove line items.

issues.title: Receipts: Generate PDF receipt locally for each completed sale
issues.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- PDF includes required receipt fields.
- Saved to configured local folder with predictable naming.
- Handles long carts cleanly.

issues.title: Reporting: Sales History screen with filters
issues.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- Filter by date range and/or receipt #.
- View sale detail (items, totals, payment method).
- Open/reprint receipt.

issues.title: Packaging: Build Windows .exe via PyInstaller (no Python install required)
issues.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- Release build runs on a clean Windows 10/11 machine.
- Includes required dependencies.
- Startup and checkout tested.

issues.title: QA: Smoke test checklist on target workflow (ring-up → receipt → history)
issues.body:
Acceptance criteria:
- Checklist covers: fresh install, connect to Azure SQL, add product, add customer, complete sale, receipt PDF, reprint.
- Issues logged and triaged.
